summary: Yet another follower mod that\'s not special...except the name of this 2 hand warrior.
descriptionHtml:
So recently I got CK...and tried to make a follower for myself...well, my first creation....and this guy is named after me...I was considering should I upload it or not...And finally I decided to upload it...because it\'s my first creation

2 handed warrior started wtih a steel battleaxe and steel armor...level cap is 90...Health is high enough to take some hits...i.e. meat shield. Find him at Dragonsreach.

Maybe I\'ll try to add more dialog for him(me?) when I know how to put extra dialog in an actor(NPC).

And this mod is simply using anything I can find inside Skyrim itself, no other stuffs used...well, modify it if you want.
author: CrazyFPSEric
